content: शश्वत् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Perpetually, eternally, for ever. {@--2@} Constantly, repeatedly, always, frequently, again and again; <ls>R. 2. 48</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 70</ls>; <ls>Me. 55.</ls> (In <ab>comp.</ab> शश्वत् may be translated by ‘lasting, eternal’; as शश्वच्छांति eternal tranquillity.).
